title: Environmental Field Meth
description: Semester-long focus on single environmental project in the local area.  Chemical and physical techniques for parameterizing environmental problems, data analysis, report writing, and interpretation of results in societal context.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: EAS 4221 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or EAS 4656 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
